lead_paragraph: At times during his years in New York, Mike Piazza was perhaps baseball’s best player; at other times, he struggled to get the ball out of the infield. But in terms of pizazz, he never disappointed.
snippet: At times during his years in New York, Mike Piazza was perhaps baseball’s best player; at other times, he struggled to get the ball out of the infield. But in terms of pizazz, he never disappointed.

headline.main: A Star Who Gave the Mets a Jolt, and Not Just at the Plate
headline.print_headline: A Star Who Gave the Mets a Jolt, and Not Just at the Plate

abstract: David Waldstein On Baseball column holds that former MLB catcher Mike Piazza, who was recently elected into Baseball Hall of Fame, was just as sharp off field as on field; notes that Piazza yearned to be rock star, and would often spin records at radio studio after games.
